bool SetConfiguration (Camera *&camera)
 Confifuration of the camera image format. More...
 

Detailed Description

Configuration of the camera mode.

This configures the image format of the cameras. Thus, both cameras have the exactly the same configuration, allowing to use them as a stereo system

Author
Marcelo Pereira
